title: datalad wtf takes too long, but only in X2go session

labels.name: severity-minor
labels.description: a problem which doesn't affect the package's usefulness, and is presumably trivial to fix

body:
#### What is the problem?
Running `datalad wtf` on the same system, same folder, takes 2 seconds via SSH or regular Gnome gui (via Teamviewer) but takes 2 minutes in a terminal via GUI X2go session using XFCE. Debug and timing in the logs below.
